name: Engage: Publish
tagline: Engage: Publish is an article management system/workflow engine for your DotNetNuke portal. It provides advanced content management capabilities with workflow - approval, content categorization and related articles.
body:
### Releases

 - 5.8.6

note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
